sentences.en: A contempt for knee - jerk French anti - Americanism also unites the two men.
sentences.cn: 对法国当下机械的 反 美主义的蔑视也使得这两位大人物走在了一起.

sentences.en: Anti - Americanism is running high among Turks.
sentences.cn: 反 美主义情绪在土耳其人民中高涨.

sentences.en: By this I don't just mean the rampant anti - Americanism on parts of the left.
sentences.cn: 但是,两岸一些地区却对此漠不关心甚至充满敌视,我十分担忧.

sentences.en: The pursuit of happiness may even help to explain the surge of anti - Americanism.
sentences.cn: 甚至 反 美情绪的高涨也可以用追求幸福来解析.

sentences.en: The third essential change is the solidification of anti - Americanism as a political idea.
sentences.cn: 第三个变化就是反美主义正在团结成为一种政治理念.

sentences.en: The upshot: anti - Americanism will surge.
sentences.cn: 这样的结果就是: 反 美情绪又会高涨.
